QuestData.Title: Where the Road Leads
QuestData.Description:
My people know many secrets about this place. If you prove yourselves worthy allies, you will be privy to them.
First, we must regroup in Mezzamere. There, we at least have a foothold against the tide.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lady Jaina Proudmoore at Mezzamere.
